item.description:
The Meet Ups are scheduled for  2 1/2 to 3 hours.  All media and all levels of experience are welcome.  Toward the end of the session, we can gather and look at each others work.

If you have another location to recommend, please do so.
item.how_to_find_us: 322 Totten Pond Road, Waltham. Meet at the parking lot, of Totten Pond Rd, then, find a place for each of us to set up. Lots of trees. We could drive to the top of the hill for long views over the surrounding areas. All levels welcome.
item.name: Cancelled -- Sorry, Prospect Hill Park, Waltham
